he/him • EST

I'm a 17 year old undergraduate student studying mathematics at the University of Waterloo from Hong Kong studying in Canada. I'd like to major in computational mathematics. I go by Tnixc online.

I love tinkering with software, programming, and design. You can learn more about me on about.

Work

I now mostly work with Rust. I love compilers, language design, developer tooling, type theory, and performance engineering. Right now I'm working on volette, my language and compiler.

I've also worked with C, JavaScript & TypeScript, OCaml, Nix, Go, Java, Python and other web development languages with frameworks such as Vue, Svelte, and Solid.

You can view my projects on my GitHub. I'm also a part of the ←ctp webring→.

If you're in Waterloo lets meet up. I also go to socratica every week.

I'm always welcome to cold emails! So please email me.

Thanks for reading!
